item.description:
Please join us for another terrific evening of networking with local business leaders. We are meeting at Ponte Vecchio in Danvers to share ideas, contacts and qualified referrals. We will also discuss at this time thoughts on future events and additional opportunities for effective collaboration and joint ventures on the North Shore.

This event is open to all and is organized by the North Shore Networkers, Topsfield's BNI Chapter. Following our evening MeetUp that week, the North Shore Networkers will host a Visitors' Day at the chapter meeting at 7 a.m. on Thursday morning, June 17th, 478 Boston Road, Rt. 1, Topsfield. We invite all area professionals to consider the opportunity to join our alliance of non-competing businesses dedicated to referring clients to one another. You can learn more by viewing our new video of testimonials from members at: http://bit.ly/BNIvide...

Please join us June 17 for an engaging evening of networking. Be certain to bring plenty of business cards.

If you have any questions, feel free to e-mail us or call Christine Bolzan (978) 986-4733.

We look forward to meeting you.
item.name: June MeetUp
